description: This source file defines API endpoints for AI usage guidance and diagnostics in a healthcare note management system, utilizing Django REST Framework and drf-yasg for Swagger UI documentation.

classes.name: AIConfig
classes.description: Configuration class for AI environment settings, including validation and environment variable parsing.

methods.name: from_env
methods.description: Loads AI configuration from environment variables.

classes.name: AIClient
classes.description: Client interface for interacting with AI provider, including performing live connectivity checks.

methods.name: live_check
methods.description: Performs a lightweight check to verify AI provider connectivity and credentials.

methods.name: ai_usage_help(request)
methods.description: API endpoint providing guidance on how to use AI features and configure the environment.

methods.name: ai_diagnostics(request)
methods.description: API endpoint that performs a diagnostics check on AI configuration and connectivity.
